column4: i toke 2 days to config the old config and i will not reconfig it again
damn, one time a running dist-upgrade... everytime the same shit... grr
it was quite difficult to set it up, because this intel 855gm sucks and the dell 2001FP tft, too.
i switched to ubuntu to have a running system, but this is really worst.
why must they change this fonts and so on on a way, nothing will run after it?
if you really want help it may be a better strategy to stop blaming ubuntu for everything and try to give more information about the actual problem.
if i could find something usefull in the logs, i will do...
when trying to start X do you get some (EE) entries in /var/log/Xorg.0.log?
following what you have written last day about X not working and so on, maybe a fresh breezy install is the way to go anyways...
with 5.10 i'll get the xorg problem again
and still you try to upgrade to it? Or are you trying to downgrade to hoary from breezy?
